title: Bug 109718: Text item with large content shows the tips in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

EXPECTED RESULT: The tips should be shown in the given format

ACTUAL RESULT: The tips are shown in one line
OB:
When a large content is put into a text item, the tips that show the content are displayed in a single line.

MINOR ENHANCEMENTS:
32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMENTDEFN CLASS
32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS
32.3 REVIEW RESULT
32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT

CURRENTLY, WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTY FILE. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGES ARE DUPLICATE.
EB: The tips for the text item should show the content in a formatted manner, not in a single line.
